name: Greyish Dark Theme
description: A greyish dark theme for Wanikani, heavily inspired by "WaniKani Breeze Dark" (https://userstyles.org/styles/135572/wanikani-breeze-dark) made by Valeth.
additional_info:
I might have missed some parts of the Community section as I don't use it.

I realize that people with CSS experience will probably look at this and think the code is terrible, but well... I'm really an amateur having some practice by making this theme.

13th of June Update:
- changed the colours of burned items and learned radicals, kanji and vocab in the Levels, Radicals, Kanji and Vocabulary sections
- changed the little 新 badge a little
- changed the background of "Your Progress" part on individual mnemonics
- changed the colours of progress bars outside of reviews/lessons
- changed the colours of progress bar at the top of reviews/lessons
- added more screenshots to this page
